verses.verse: He showed <S%G2532><s%> me <S%G1166><s%> a <S%G3427><s%> river <S%G2513><s%> of water of <S%G4215><s%> life <S%G5204><s%> <S%G2222><s%>, clear as <S%G2986><s%> crystal <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2930><s%>, proceeding out of the <S%G1607><s%> throne of <S%G1537><s%> God and <S%G2362><s%> of the <S%G2316><s%> Lamb <S%G2532><s%> <S%G721><s%>,

in the middle of <S%G1722><s%> its <S%G3319><s%> street <S%G846><s%> <S%G4113><s%>. On this side <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G2532><s%> river <S%G1782><s%> and <S%G4215><s%> on that was <S%G2532><s%> the tree of <S%G1782><s%> life <S%G3586><s%> <S%G2222><s%>, bearing twelve kinds of <S%G4160><s%> fruits <S%G1427><s%> <S%G2590><s%>, yielding its <S%G591><s%> fruit <S%G846><s%> <S%G2590><s%> <S%G1520><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1538><s%> month. <S%G3376><s%> The leaves of the tree were <S%G5444><s%> for the <S%G3586><s%> healing of <S%G1519><s%> the nations <S%G2322><s%> <S%G1484><s%>.

There will be <S%G2532><s%> no <S%G2071><s%> curse <S%G3756><s%> any <S%G2652><s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2532><s%> more. <S%G2089><s%> The throne of God and <S%G2362><s%> of the <S%G2316><s%> Lamb will <S%G2532><s%> be <S%G721><s%> in <S%G2071><s%> it <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>, and his <S%G2532><s%> servants <S%G846><s%> serve <S%G1401><s%> him <S%G3000><s%> <S%G846><s%>.

They will see <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G3700><s%> face <S%G846><s%> <S%G4383><s%>, and his <S%G2532><s%> name will be <S%G846><s%> on <S%G3686><s%> their <S%G1909><s%> foreheads <S%G846><s%> <S%G3359><s%>.

There <S%G2532><s%> will be <S%G1563><s%> no <S%G2071><s%> night <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3571><s%>, and they <S%G2532><s%> need <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G5532><s%> lamp <S%G3756><s%> light <S%G3088><s%> <S%G2532><s%>; <S%G5457><s%> <S%G2246><s%> for the Lord <S%G3754><s%> God <S%G2962><s%> will illuminate <S%G2316><s%> them <S%G5461><s%> <S%G846><s%>. They will reign <S%G2532><s%> <S%G936><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever and ever <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>.

He said to <S%G2532><s%> me <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3427><s%>, "These words <S%G3778><s%> are faithful <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G4103><s%> true <S%G2532><s%> <S%G228><s%>. The Lord God <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G2962><s%> spirits of the prophets <S%G2316><s%> <S%G99999><s%> sent <S%G4396><s%> his <S%G649><s%> angel <S%G846><s%> to show to <S%G32><s%> his bondservants <S%G1166><s%> the things <S%G846><s%> which <S%G1401><s%> must <S%G3739><s%> happen <S%G1163><s%> <S%G1722><s%> soon. <S%G5034><s%>"

"Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come quickly <S%G2064><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. Blessed is he who <S%G3107><s%> keeps the <S%G3588><s%> words of <S%G5083><s%> the prophecy of <S%G3056><s%> this <S%G4394><s%> book <S%G5127><s%> <S%G975><s%>."

Now I <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1473><s%>, John, <S%G2491><s%> am the one who heard and <S%G191><s%> saw <S%G2532><s%> these things <S%G991><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. When <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G3753><s%> and <S%G191><s%> saw <S%G2532><s%> <S%G991><s%>, I fell down to worship <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G4352><s%> the feet of <S%G1715><s%> the angel who had shown <S%G4228><s%> <S%G32><s%> me <S%G1166><s%> these things <S%G3427><s%> <S%G99999><s%>.

He said to <S%G2532><s%> me <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3427><s%>, "See you don <S%G3708><s%> 't <S%G3361><s%> do it! <S%G1063><s%> I am a <S%G1510><s%> fellow bondservant with <S%G4675><s%> you and with <S%G4889><s%> your <S%G2532><s%> brothers <S%G4675><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> and with those who keep the <S%G2532><s%> words of <S%G5083><s%> this <S%G3056><s%> book <S%G5127><s%> <S%G975><s%>. Worship God <S%G4352><s%> <S%G2316><s%>."

He said to <S%G2532><s%> me <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3427><s%>, "Don't <S%G3361><s%> seal up the words of the prophecy <S%G4972><s%> of <S%G3056><s%> this <S%G4394><s%> book <S%G5127><s%> <S%G975><s%>, for the time <S%G3754><s%> is <S%G2540><s%> at hand <S%G2076><s%> <S%G1451><s%>.

He who acts unjustly, <S%G91><s%> let him act unjustly still <S%G91><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. He who is filthy <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4510><s%>, let him be filthy still <S%G4510><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. He who is righteous <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1342><s%>, let him do righteousness still <S%G1344><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. He who is holy <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, let him be holy still <S%G37><s%> <S%G99999><s%>."

<S%G2532><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I come quickly <S%G2064><s%> <S%G99999><s%>. My <S%G2532><s%> reward <S%G3450><s%> is with <S%G3408><s%> me <S%G3326><s%> <S%G1700><s%>, to repay to each man <S%G591><s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G99999><s%> according to his <S%G5613><s%> work <S%G846><s%> <S%G99999><s%>.

I am <S%G1473><s%> the Alpha <S%G1510><s%> and <S%G1><s%> the Omega <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5598><s%>, the First and <S%G4413><s%> the Last <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, the Beginning and <S%G746><s%> the End <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%>.

Blessed are those who <S%G3107><s%> do <S%G3588><s%> his <S%G4160><s%> commandments <S%G846><s%> <S%G1785><s%>, that they <S%G2443><s%> may have the <S%G846><s%> right <S%G2071><s%> to <S%G1849><s%> the tree of <S%G1909><s%> life <S%G3586><s%> <S%G2222><s%>, and may enter in by the gates <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G4440><s%> the city <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4172><s%>.

Outside are the <S%G1161><s%> dogs <S%G1854><s%> <S%G2965><s%>, the sorcerers <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5333><s%>, the sexually immoral <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, the murderers <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5406><s%>, the idolaters <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1496><s%>, and everyone <S%G2532><s%> who loves <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G5368><s%> practices <S%G2532><s%> falsehood <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5579><s%>.

I, <S%G1473><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> have sent my <S%G3992><s%> angel <S%G3450><s%> to testify these <S%G32><s%> things to <S%G3140><s%> you <S%G5023><s%> for <S%G5213><s%> the assemblies <S%G1909><s%> <S%G1577><s%>. I am <S%G1473><s%> the root <S%G1510><s%> and <S%G4491><s%> the offspring of <S%G2532><s%> David <S%G1085><s%> <S%G1138><s%>; the Bright and <S%G2986><s%> Morning <S%G2532><s%> Star <S%G3720><s%> <S%G792><s%>."

The Spirit <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G4151><s%> the bride <S%G2532><s%> say <S%G3565><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, "Come! <S%G2064><s%>" He who hears <S%G2532><s%> <S%G191><s%>, let him say, <S%G2036><s%> "Come! <S%G2064><s%>" He who is thirsty <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1372><s%>, let him come. <S%G2064><s%> He who desires <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, let him take the water of <S%G2983><s%> life <S%G5204><s%> freely <S%G2222><s%> <S%G1432><s%>.

I testify to <S%G1063><s%> everyone who <S%G4828><s%> hears the <S%G3956><s%> words of <S%G191><s%> the prophecy of <S%G3056><s%> this <S%G4394><s%> book <S%G5127><s%> <S%G975><s%>, if anyone <S%G1437><s%> adds <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G2007><s%> them <S%G4314><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, may God add <S%G2316><s%> to <S%G2007><s%> him <S%G1909><s%> the plagues which <S%G846><s%> are written <S%G4127><s%> in <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G1722><s%> book <S%G5129><s%> <S%G975><s%>.

If <S%G2532><s%> anyone <S%G1437><s%> takes away <S%G5100><s%> from <S%G851><s%> the words of <S%G575><s%> the book of <S%G3056><s%> this <S%G976><s%> prophecy <S%G5129><s%> <S%G4394><s%>, may God take away <S%G2316><s%> his <S%G851><s%> part <S%G846><s%> from <S%G3313><s%> the tree of <S%G575><s%> life <S%G976><s%> <S%G2222><s%>, and out <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the holy <S%G1537><s%> city <S%G40><s%> <S%G4172><s%>, which are written in <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G1722><s%> book <S%G5026><s%> <S%G975><s%>.

He who testifies <S%G3588><s%> these things <S%G3140><s%> says <S%G5023><s%> <S%G99999><s%>, "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> I come quickly <S%G2064><s%> <S%G99999><s%>." Amen! <S%G281><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> Lord Jesus <S%G2962><s%> <S%G2424><s%>.
The grace of the <S%G5485><s%> Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2962><s%> Christ <S%G2424><s%> be with <S%G5547><s%> all <S%G3326><s%> the saints <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5216><s%>. Amen. <S%G281><s%>
